content.json: **NOTE**: This data connector depends on a parser based on Kusto Function **TMApexOneEvent** to work as expected. [Follow steps to get this Kusto Function](https://aka.ms/sentinel-TMApexOneEvent-parser)

parameters.name: TimeRange
parameters.description: Sets the time name for analysis

content.query:
TMApexOneEvent
| make-series TotalEvents = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain};
content.title: Events Over Time

content.query:
TMApexOneEvent
  | where EventMessage has "Endpoint Application Control"
  | where DvcAction has "blocked"
  | count
content.title: Blocked applications

content.query:
TMApexOneEvent
 | extend EventType = case(
  EventMessage == "7", "Web Security", 
  EventMessage == "virusa", "Predictive Machine Learning",
  EventMessage == "Attack Discovery Detections", "Attack Discovery Detection", 
  EventMessage == "Behavior Monitoring", "Behavior Monitoring",
  EventMessage == "CnC Callback", "C&C Callback", 
  EventMessage == "This is a policy name", "Policy name",
  EventMessage == "Data Loss Prevention", "Data Loss Prevention", 
  EventMessage == "Device Access Control", "Device Access Control",
  EventMessage == "Endpoint Application Control Violation Information", "Endpoint Application Control", 
  EventMessage == "Engine Update Status", "Engine Update Status",
  EventMessage == "Managed Product Logon/Logoff Events", "Managed Product Logon/Logoff Events", 
  EventMessage == "Suspicious Connection", "Suspicious Connection",
  EventMessage == "Pattern Update Status", "Pattern Update Status", 
  EventMessage == "VAN_RANSOMWARE.umxxhelloransom_abc", "Sandbox Detection",
  EventMessage == "Spyware Detected", "Spyware Detected", 
  EventMessage == "JS_EXPLOIT.SMDN", "Virus/Malware Detected",
  EventMessage == "Suspicious Files", "Suspicious Files",
  "unknown")
  | summarize count() by EventType

TMApexOneEvent
  | where isnotempty(ApplicationProtocol)
  | extend AppProtocol = case(
  ApplicationProtocol == "0", "Unknown", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "1", "SMTP",
  ApplicationProtocol == "2", "POP3",
  ApplicationProtocol == "3", "IRC", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "4", "DNS Response",
  ApplicationProtocol == "5", "HTTP",
  ApplicationProtocol == "6", "FTP", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "7", "TFTP",
  ApplicationProtocol == "8", "SMB",
  ApplicationProtocol == "9", "Windows Live Messenger (MSN)", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "10", "AIM",
  ApplicationProtocol == "11", "Yahoo! Messenger",
  ApplicationProtocol == "12", "Gmail",
  ApplicationProtocol == "13", "Yahoo! Mail", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "14", "Windows Live Hotmail",
  ApplicationProtocol == "15", "RDP",
  ApplicationProtocol == "16", "DHCP",
  ApplicationProtocol == "17", "Telnet", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "18", "LDAP",
  ApplicationProtocol == "19", "File transfer",
  ApplicationProtocol == "20", "SSH",
  ApplicationProtocol == "21", "Dameware", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "22", "VNC",
  ApplicationProtocol == "23", "Cisco Telnet",
  ApplicationProtocol == "24", "Kerberos", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "25", "DCE RPC",
  ApplicationProtocol == "26", "SQL",
  ApplicationProtocol == "27", "pcAnywhere", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "28", "ICMP",

  ApplicationProtocol == "30", "Virus pattern TCP", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "31", "Virus pattern UDP",
  ApplicationProtocol == "32", "HTTPS",
  ApplicationProtocol == "33", "SMB2",
  ApplicationProtocol == "34", "MMS", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "35", "IMAP4",
  ApplicationProtocol == "36", "RADIUS",
  ApplicationProtocol == "37", "Radmin",
  ApplicationProtocol == "38", "FTP_Response", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "48", "RTSP/RTP-UDP",
  ApplicationProtocol == "49", "RTSP/RTP-TCP",
  ApplicationProtocol == "50", "RTSP/RDT-UDP",
  ApplicationProtocol == "51", "RTSP/RDT-TCP",
  ApplicationProtocol == "52", "WMSP",
  ApplicationProtocol == "53", "SHOUTCast", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "54", "RTMP",
  ApplicationProtocol == "68", "DNS Request",
  ApplicationProtocol == "256", "BitTorrent", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "257", "Kazaa",
  ApplicationProtocol == "258", "Limewire",
  ApplicationProtocol == "259", "Bearshare", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "260", "Bluester",
  ApplicationProtocol == "261", "Edonkey emule",
  ApplicationProtocol == "262", "Edonkey2000",
  ApplicationProtocol == "263", "Filezilla", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "264", "Guncleus",
  ApplicationProtocol == "265", "Gnutella",
  ApplicationProtocol == "266", "Winny",
  ApplicationProtocol == "267", "Napster", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "268", "Morpheus",
  ApplicationProtocol == "269", "Napster",
  ApplicationProtocol == "270", "Shareaza",
  ApplicationProtocol == "271", "WinMX", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "272", "Mldonkey",
  ApplicationProtocol == "273", "Direct Connect",
  ApplicationProtocol == "274", "Soulseek", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "275", "OpenAP",
  ApplicationProtocol == "276", "Kuro",
  ApplicationProtocol == "277", "Imesh", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "278", "Skype",
  ApplicationProtocol == "279", "Google Talk",
  ApplicationProtocol == "317", "Cabos", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "318", "Zultrax",
  ApplicationProtocol == "319", "Foxy",
  ApplicationProtocol == "320", "eDonkey",
  ApplicationProtocol == "321", "Ares", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "322", "Miranda",
  ApplicationProtocol == "323", "Kceasy",
  ApplicationProtocol == "324", "MoodAmp",
  ApplicationProtocol == "325", "Deepnet Explorer", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "326", "FreeWire",
  ApplicationProtocol == "327", "Gimme",
  ApplicationProtocol == "328", "GnucDNA GWebCache",
  ApplicationProtocol == "329", "Jubster",
  ApplicationProtocol == "330", "MyNapster", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "331", "Nova GWebCache",
  ApplicationProtocol == "332", "Swapper GWebCache",
  ApplicationProtocol == "333", "Xnap",
  ApplicationProtocol == "334", "Xolox", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "335", "Ppstream",
  ApplicationProtocol == "640", "AIM Express",
  ApplicationProtocol == "641", "Chikka SMS Messenger",
  ApplicationProtocol == "642", "eBuddy", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "643", "ICQ2Go",
  ApplicationProtocol == "644", "ILoveIM Web Messenger",
  ApplicationProtocol == "645", "IMUnitive",
  ApplicationProtocol == "646", "Mabber",
  ApplicationProtocol == "647", "Meebo",
  ApplicationProtocol == "648", "Yahoo! Web Messenger", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "848", "SIP2",
  ApplicationProtocol == "1024", "GPass",
  ApplicationProtocol == "10001", "IP",
  ApplicationProtocol == "10002", "ARP",
  ApplicationProtocol == "10003", "TCP", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "10004", "UDP",
  ApplicationProtocol == "10005", "IGMP",
  ApplicationProtocol == "60", "ORACLE", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "44", "MySQL",
  ApplicationProtocol == "520", "MSSQL",
  ApplicationProtocol == "337", "Postgres", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "41", "ICMPv6",
  ApplicationProtocol == "10006", "GGP",
  ApplicationProtocol == "10007", "PUP",
  ApplicationProtocol == "10008", "IDP", 
  ApplicationProtocol == "10009", "ND",
  ApplicationProtocol == "10010", "RAW",
  "unknown")
  | summarize ProtocolCount = count() by AppProtocol
content.title: Network protocols

content.query:
TMApexOneEvent
| where EventMessage has "CnC Callback" 
| project EventEndTime, SrcIpAddr,  DstIpAddr
content.title: CnC connections

content.query:
TMApexOneEvent
| where EventMessage has "Endpoint Application Control"
| where DvcAction has "Blocked"
| project EventEndTime, Application = FileName, SrcUserName
content.title: Blocked applications

content.query:
TMApexOneEvent
  | where isnotempty(FileName)
  | extend File = strcat(FilePath, FileName)
  | summarize count() by File
  | sort by count_ desc
content.title: Suspicious files

content.query:
TMApexOneEvent
| sort by TimeGenerated desc 
| where EventMessage !in~ ("Engine Update Statusd", "Pattern Update Status")
| project EventEndTime, Module=EventMessage, FileName
content.title: Latest detections

content.query:
TMApexOneEvent
  | where EventMessage has "Data Loss Prevention"
  | extend DeviceCustomNumber3 = coalesce(column_ifexists("FieldDeviceCustomNumber3", long(null)),DeviceCustomNumber3)
  | where isnotempty(DeviceCustomNumber3)
  | extend Channel_Type = case(
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "65535", "Not available",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "0", "Removable storage", 
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "1", "SMB",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "2", "Email",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "3", "IM", 
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "4", "FTP",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "5", "HTTP",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "6", "HTTPS", 
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "7", "PGP",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "8", "Data recorders",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "9", "Printer", 
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "10", "Clipboard",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "11", "Sync",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "12", "P2P",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "13", "Webmail", 
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "14", "Document management",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "15", "Cloud storage",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "121", "SMTP email",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "122", "Exchange Client Mail", 
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "123", "Lotus Note Email",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "130", "Webmail (Yahoo! Mail)",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "131", "Webmail (Hotmail)",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "132", "Webmail (Gmail)",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "133", "Webmail (AOL Mail)",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "140", "IM (MSN)",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "141", "IM (AIM)",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "142", "IM (Yahoo Messenger)",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "143", "IM (Skype)",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "191", "P2P (BitTorrent)",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "192", "P2P (EMule)",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "193", "P2P (Winny)",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "194", "P2P (HTCSYN)",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "195", "P2P (iTunes)",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "196", "Cloud storage (DropBox)",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "197", "Cloud storage (Box)",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "198", "Cloud storage (Google Drive)",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "199", "Cloud storage (OneDrive)",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "200", "Cloud storage (SugarSync)",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "201", "Cloud storage (Hightail)",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "202", "IM (QQ)",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "203", "Webmail (other)",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "204", "Cloud storage (Evernote)",
  DeviceCustomNumber3 == "211", "Document management (SharePoint)",
  "unknown")
  | summarize ChannelType = count() by Channel_Type
content.title: Channel types
